select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where 1=1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and b.departid =#{departid}
select id as username,name,parentid as departid,0 as state from sys_department union select a.username ,b.name,a.departid,1 as state from sys_deptuser a left join sys_user b on a.username=b.username

select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where a.username=#{username}

select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where a.username in(select manager from sys_department where id in(select departid from sys_deptuser where username=#{username}))

select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where a.username in(select leader from sys_department where id in(select departid from sys_deptuser where username=#{username}))

select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where b.departid=#{departid}

select a.id, a.name,a.username,b.departid,b.id as guuid,c.name as departname,a.tel,a.email,a.sex,a.state from sys_user a left join sys_deptuser b on a.username=b.username left join sys_department c on b.departid=c.id where b.departid=#{departid} LIMIT #{page},#{pagesize}
mapper.update: update sys_user set name=#{name},tel=#{tel},email=#{email},sex=#{sex},state=#{state} where id=#{id}; update sys_deptuser set departid=#{departid} where id=#{guuid};
update sys_user set password=#{pwd} where username=#{username};
